headline: Co-Packaged Optics Market Report 2026-2036: NVIDIA vs. Broadcom Ecosystem Strategies, CPO Platforms, and Foundry Roadmaps
summary: The global Co-Packaged Optics (CPO) market is set for transformative growth, driven by the burgeoning demands of AI, large language models, and generative AI. CPO technology addresses key issues such as bandwidth, power consumption, and latency inefficiencies existing in traditional pluggable modules. By integrating optical transceivers with switch ASICs, CPO significantly reduces power consumption from 15 to 5 picojoules per bit, with ambitions to go below 1. Market segmentation into scale-out

headline: MACOM Appoints Bryan Ingram to its Board of Directors
summary: LOWELL, Mass., Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MACOM Technology Solutions Holdings, Inc. (“MACOM”) (NASDAQ: MTSI), a leading supplier of semiconductor products, today announced the appointment of Bryan Ingram as an independent director to MACOM’s Board to Directors (the “Board”), effective January 12, 2026. Mr. Ingram has had a distinguished career, spanning engineering, operations, technical management and executive roles and has successfully managed complex semiconductor businesses in excess

content.title: MACOM Appoints Bryan Ingram to its Board of Directors
content.summary: LOWELL, Mass., Jan. 12, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- MACOM Technology Solutions Holdings, Inc. (“MACOM”) (NASDAQ: MTSI), a leading supplier of semiconductor products, today announced the appointment of Bryan Ingram as an independent director to MACOM’s Board to Directors (the “Board”), effective January 12, 2026. Mr. Ingram has had a distinguished career, spanning engineering, operations, technical management and executive roles and has successfully managed complex semiconductor businesses in excess
